string.name: wp_onboarding_accept_button
string.context: A button that, when pressed, gives permission to perform an action

string.name: wp_onboarding_return_button
string.context: A button that, when pressed, returns to the previous screen

string.name: wp_onboarding_skip_button
string.context: A button that, when pressed, skips the current onboarding workflow step

string.name: wp_onboarding_access_button
string.context: A button that, when pressed, accesses MyChart. %1$@ is the app name.

string.name: wp_onboarding_play_button
string.context: A button that, when pressed, plays the background animation for the welcome screen.

string.name: wp_onboarding_pause_button
string.context: A button that, when pressed, pauses the background animation for the welcome screen.

string.name: wp_core_onboarding_skip
string.context: Button label to dismiss Home Page onboarding.

string.name: wp_core_onboarding_next
string.context: Button label to move to the next slide in the Home Page onboarding workflow.

string.name: wp_core_onboarding_back
string.context: Button label to move to the previous slide in the Home Page onboarding workflow.

string.name: wp_core_onboarding_complete
string.context: Button label to complete the Home Page onboarding workflow.

string.name: wp_core_onboarding_how_to_video
string.context: This is the text of a button that the user can select to play an educational video.

string.name: wp_core_accessibility_onboarding_page_control
string.context: Accessibility label telling the user what page of Home Page onboarding they are currently on. %1$@ is the current page index. $2$s is the total number of pages.

string.name: wp_onboarding_ax_welcome_logo
string.context: Accessibility string that is read out to a user upon tapping the logo on the welcome screen, welcoming the user to the app. %1$@ is the name of the app.

string.name: wp_onboarding_ax_checkbox
string.context: The accessibility role of a checkbox. Used for iOS as SwiftUI does not support a checkbox role.

string.name: wp_onboarding_progress_dots
string.context: Indicates the progress of the mid-login onboarding workflow, where %1$@ is the current task and %2$@ is the total number of tasks.

string.name: wp_onboarding_welcome_eula_checkbox
string.context: Checkbox description for accepting MyChart's EULA, where %1$@ is the regional term for the EULA, and %2$@ is the app name.

resources.string: Ich gebe meine Zustimmung zu: %1$@ für %2$@.

string.name: wp_onboarding_ax_welcome_view_eula
string.context: Accessibility string indicating that the user can tap to view the EULA for the app. %1$@ is the regional term for the EULA and %2$@ is the app name.

string.name: wp_onboarding_welcome_privacy_checkbox
string.context: Checkbox description for accepting MyChart's Privacy Policy, where %1$@ is the regional term for the Privacy Policy, and %2$@ is the app name.

resources.string: Ich gebe meine Zustimmung zu: %1$@ für %2$@.

string.name: wp_onboarding_ax_welcome_view_privacy
string.context: Accessibility string indicating that the user can tap to view the Privacy Policy for the app. %1$@ is the regional term for the Privacy Policy and %2$@ is the app name.

string.name: wp_onboarding_eula_name
string.context: Regional term for End User License Agreement.

string.name: wp_onboarding_privacy_name
string.context: Regional term for Privacy Policy.

string.name: wp_onboarding_notifications
string.context: Feature name for the notifications onboarding step.

string.name: wp_onboarding_notifications_title
string.context: Short tagline explaining why a user should enable notifications.

string.name: wp_onboarding_notifications_content
string.context: Longer reason describing why a user should enable notifications, briefly explaining the benefits.

resources.string: Sie erhalten Benachrichtigungen über neue Testresultate, Leistungserbringer-Nachrichten, Terminerinnerungen und mehr.

string.name: wp_onboarding_notifications_error_title
string.context: In the event an error occurs while trying to secure notifications permissions, show the user an alert with this string as the title.

string.name: wp_onboarding_notifications_error_body
string.context: In the event an error occurs while trying to secure notifications permissions, show the user an alert with this string as the body.

resources.string: Beim Versuch, die Berechtigung für Benachrichtigungen zu erhalten, ist ein unbekannter Fehler aufgetreten. Erneut versuchen.

string.name: wp_onboarding_location
string.context: Feature name for the location permissions onboarding step.

string.name: wp_onboarding_location_title
string.context: Short tagline explaining why a user should turn on location services.

resources.string: Optimieren Sie Ihre Erfahrung, indem Sie Ihren Standort teilen

string.name: wp_onboarding_location_content
string.context: Longer reason describing why a user should turn on location services, briefly explaining benefits and that the app will not store location data, where %1$@ is the app name

resources.string: %1$@ kann Ihren Standort verwenden, um Optionen in Ihrer Nähe vorzuschlagen, schneller bei Terminen einzuchecken und vieles mehr. %1$@ wird Ihre Standortdaten niemals speichern.

string.name: wp_onboarding_two_factor
string.context: Feature name for the two-step verification onboarding step.

string.name: wp_onboarding_two_factor_title
string.context: Short tagline explaining why a user should turn on two-step verification.

resources.string: Gewährleisten Sie die Sicherheit Ihres Kontos

string.name: wp_onboarding_two_factor_content
string.context: Longer reason describing why a user should turn on two-step verification.

resources.string: Aktivieren Sie die Zwei-Faktor-Authentisierung, um das Konto zu sichern.

string.name: wp_onboarding_two_factor_positive_button
string.context: Used as positive button text for the two factor enrollment onboarding view. When tapped, move to the authentication step of two-step setup.

string.name: wp_onboarding_two_factor_negative_button
string.context: Used as negative button text for the two factor enrollment onboarding view. When tapped, exits two factor enrollment.

string.name: wp_onboarding_two_factor_enrollment_onboarding_link
string.context: Link button text that, when tapped, lets the user learn more about the two factor enrollment setup process.

string.name: wp_onboarding_org_terms
string.context: Feature name for the terms and conditions onboarding step.

string.name: wp_onboarding_org_terms_link
string.context: Feature name for the terms and conditions onboarding step. %1$@ is the regional name for terms and conditions and the proxy disclaimer, %2$@ is the organization's name.

resources.string: Durch Tippen auf „Akzeptieren“ geben Sie Ihre Zustimmung zu: %1$@ für %2$@.

string.name: wp_onboarding_org_terms_ax_link
string.context: Accessibility string indicating that the user can tap to view the terms and conditions. %1$@ is the regional name for terms and conditions and the proxy disclaimer, %2$@ is the organization's name.

string.name: wp_onboarding_org_terms_name
string.context: Regional name for the terms and conditions and the proxy disclaimer.

string.name: wp_onboarding_org_terms_and_proxy_disclaimer_name
string.context: Regional name for the terms and conditions.

string.name: wp_onboarding_org_terms_positive_button
string.context: Used as positive button text for the organization terms and conditions onboarding view, and moves to the next step of onboarding.

string.name: wp_onboarding_org_terms_negative_button
string.context: Used as negative button text for the organization terms and conditions onboarding view. If this button is pushed, it should log the user out.

string.name: wp_onboarding_name_list_separator
string.context: A separator used repeatedly for any size list of names in the proxy disclaimer, in the terms and conditions. In English we use a comma with a space e.g. Lisa(separator)Nicole(separator)John(separator)Alex would turn into Lisa, Nicole, John, Alex.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_passcode
string.context: Feature name for the secondary login passcode onboarding step.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_passcode_title
string.context: Short tagline explaining why a user should turn on passcode secondary login.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_passcode_content
string.context: Longer reason describing why a user should turn on passcode secondary login. %1$@ is the MyChart brand name.

resources.string: 4-stelligen Passcode verwenden, um sich auf diesem Gerät schnell in %1$@ anzumelden.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_passcode_positive_button
string.context: Used as positive button text for the passcode secondary login onboarding view. When tapped, show the passcode creation screen.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_biometrics
string.context: Feature name for the secondary login biometrics onboarding step

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_biometrics_title
string.context: Short tagline explaining why a user should turn on biometrics secondary login.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_biometrics_content
string.context: Longer reason describing why a user should turn on the biometrics secondary login. %1$@ is the MyChart brand name.

resources.string: Biometrie verwenden, um sich auf diesem Gerät schnell in %1$@ anzumelden.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_biometrics_positive_button
string.context: Used as positive button text for the biometrics secondary login onboarding view. When tapped, show the Android biometrics permissions prompt.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_biometrics_error
string.context: Generic error message for when an attempt to enable biometrics fails

resources.string: Bei Aktivierung der Biometrie ist ein Fehler aufgetreten.

string.name: wp_biometric_onboarding_add_title
string.context: The title of dialog when biometric is going to be added

string.name: wp_biometric_onboarding_add_message
string.context: The message of dialog when biometric is going to be added

resources.string: Sie können die Authentifizierung mit biometrischen Daten zur Anmeldung in diesem Konto einstellen. Somit können sich alle User mit registrierten biometrischen Daten in Ihrem Konto anmelden.

string.name: wp_biometric_onboarding_new_title
string.context: The positive button of dialog when biometric is going to be added

string.name: wp_biometric_onboarding_cancel_title
string.context: The negative button of dialog when biometric is going to be added

string.name: wp_biometric_onboarding_add_message_touchid
string.context: The title of dialog when Touch ID is going to be added

resources.string: Sie können Touch ID für die Anmeldung in diesem Konto einstellen. Hierdurch wird sich jeder User mit einem für dieses Gerät registrierten Fingerabdruck in Ihrem Konto anmelden können.

string.name: wp_biometric_onboarding_new_title_touchid
string.context: The positive button of dialog when Touch ID is going to be added

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_touchid
string.context: Feature name for the secondary login Touch ID onboarding step.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_touchid_title
string.context: Short tagline explaining why a user should turn on Touch ID secondary login.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_touchid_content
string.context: Longer reason describing why a user should turn on Touch ID secondary login. %1$@ is the MyChart brand name.

resources.string: Touch ID verwenden, um sich auf diesem Gerät schnell in %1$@ anzumelden.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_touchid_positive_button
string.context: Used as positive button text for the Touch ID secondary login onboarding view. When tapped, show the Touch ID permissions prompt.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_faceid
string.context: Feature name for the secondary login Face ID onboarding step.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_faceid_title
string.context: Short tagline explaining why a user should turn on Face ID secondary login.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_faceid_content
string.context: Longer reason describing why a user should turn on Face ID secondary login. %1$@ is the MyChart brand name.

resources.string: Face ID verwenden, um sich auf diesem Gerät schnell in %1$@ anzumelden.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_faceid_positive_button
string.context: Used as positive button text for the Face ID secondary login onboarding view. When tapped, show the Face ID permissions prompt.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_opticid
string.context: (iOS only) Feature name for the secondary login Optic ID onboarding step.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_opticid_title
string.context: (iOS only) Short tagline explaining why a user should turn on Optic ID secondary login.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_opticid_content
string.context: (iOS only) Longer reason describing why a user should turn on Optic ID secondary login. %1$@ is the MyChart brand name.

resources.string: Optische ID verwenden, um sich schnell auf diesem Gerät in %1$@ anzumelden.

string.name: wp_onboarding_secondary_opticid_positive_button
string.context: (iOS only) Used as positive button text for the Optic ID secondary login onboarding view. When tapped, show the Optic ID permissions prompt.

string.name: wp_onboarding_org_select_title
string.context: Title at the top of the organization selection onboarding step

string.name: wp_onboarding_org_select_body_caption
string.context: Caption text for the organization selection onboarding step

string.name: wp_onboarding_org_select_body_line_1
string.context: 1st line of body text in the organization selection onboarding step

resources.string: Zuerst die Organisationen hinzufügen, die Ihre Gesundheitsversorgung, Versicherung und andere einschlägige Leistungen erbringen.

string.name: wp_onboarding_org_select_body_line_2
string.context: 2nd line of body text in the organization selection onboarding step

resources.string: Beginnen Sie mit der Suche nach Ihrer Organisation oder scannen Sie den von Ihrer Organisation bereitgestellten QR-Code.

string.name: wp_onboarding_org_select_positive_button_text
string.context: Positive button text for the organization selection onboarding step

string.name: wp_onboarding_acknowledge_button_text
string.context: Text for a button that a user taps to acknowledge a document (typically the Privacy Policy of the app)

string.name: wp_privacy_policy_acknowledge_checkbox_label
string.context: Checkbox label prompting users to acknowledge the app's Privacy Policy where %1$@ is the Privacy Policy document name (always set to the wp_onboarding_privacy_name string) and %2$@ is the app name.
